message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm offering it to you at $1,350,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This is a fair offer considering the benefits it provides.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am able to increase my offer to $1,225,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.
